channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 13:47 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages.
item.description: 🟢 13:47 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:30 Alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district-Lipetsk territorial community- Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 13:30 Alarm to Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district-Lipetsk territorial community- Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv.
